title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A novel about the American Dream and the roaring twenties.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A science fiction saga about politics, religion, and humanity.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after a shocking act of violence.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A groundbreaking narrative of humanity’s creation and evolution.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that uses surveillance and propaganda to control society.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel about love, society, and class distinctions in early 19th century England.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who escapes her strict upbringing to pursue education and self-discovery.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A story about teenage rebellion and angst, narrated by Holden Caulfield.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy adventure about Bilbo Baggins and his quest to reclaim a lost treasure.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A tale of a shepherd boy’s journey to discover his personal legend.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A poignant story of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life.

title: Brave New World
author: Aldous Huxley
description: A dystopian novel exploring a technologically advanced but dehumanized society.
